title: Can't find app to download
body: Got the email and clicked on the link and it says item not found and gives just a retry button which just refreshes the item not found when clicked. Searching for the app on the play store also comes up with nothing that looks like the right one. Trying on a Samsung galaxy S5 version 5.1.1

replies.body: I had a similar issue, where a link given within the app led to the play store being unable to find the app.  This was the rate the app button.  I'm guessing that it is due to the restricted access of the app.

> [{quoted}](name=Mjb,realm=NA,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=bs6VTNol,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-29T03:18:10.059+0000)
>
> I had a similar issue, where a link given within the app led to the play store being unable to find the app.  This was the rate the app button.  I'm guessing that it is due to the restricted access of the app.

Oh! Sorry, you're right - that button totally doesn't work yet. Thank you for trying to push it though, great testing! :D

When the app comes out of closed beta, that button will go live. We do receive all of the star ratings sent through the feedback page before that though, so please do continue to give ratings there.
I had the same issue.  It didnt work at all untill I disconnected my Wifi.  Once I swaped over to mobile data, it poped up with the app.

Hopefully you've found it by now, but I had to type in "League Friends Beta" word for word, and it was the first one, the icon is a little weird looking with just a giant B and all.  Anything else you typed in, it's very finicky and since it's a new app it probably won't show up so easily from vague searches.
I also had a similar problem where I couldnt find the app on the play store, but the link within the email worked after a few tries. Keep trying!
